    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>c31240b5-2583-451c-886f-48a80db8f311#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A pongyolapitypang repítőszőrös termése</string>
            <string language="en">Dandelion's fly-piliferous fruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Des Löwenzahns fliegt-piliferous Frucht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le pissenlit volent-piliferous le fruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O dandelion voa-piliferous a fruta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il dente di leone vola -piliferous la frutta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μύγα-χνοώδη φρούτα πικραλίδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El diente de león vuela -piliferous la fruta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A pongyolapitypang terméses hajtásáról készült felvétel</string>
            <string language="en">Snapshot taken on the fruity shoot of dandelion</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">bőrszövet,  repítőszőr,  </string>
            <string language="en">epidermis, fly-pilifer</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Snapshot genommen auf dem fruchtigen Eintragfaden
des Löwenzahns</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instantané pris sur la pousse fruitée du 
pissenlit</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instantâneo feito exame no tiro fruity do 
dandelion</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fotografia istantanea presa sul tiro al gusto di 
frutta del dente di leone</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στιγμιότυπο που λαμβάνεται στο fruity βλαστό της 
πικραλίδας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Foto tomada en el lanzamiento con sabor a fruta 
del diente de león</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Epidermis, fliegen-pilifer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'épiderme, volent-pilifer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o epidermis, voa-pilifer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'epidermide, vola -pilifer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιδερμίδα, μύγα-πηληφερ-μύγα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la epidermis, vuela -pilifer</string>
          </keyword>
